name: API Sync
description: Automates exporting/importing to/from remote REDCap servers via the API.  The Data Dictionaries for the local and remote projects are expected to be either identical or compatible.  This module could easily be expanded to support additional scenarios (like automatically syncing the data dictionary as well).

project-settings.name: Disable error notification emails to superusers on the project (or the general system admin email if there are none on the project).

Exports
Exports overwrite remote data with local data. Records are automatically exported individually about a minute after a record is saved or deleted. All records can be exported at once via the API Sync page/link in the left menu.

sub_settings.name: Project Name - This is required, but is only used for local logging and does not have to exactly match the remote project.

project-settings.name:
Imports
Imports overwrite local data with remote data. Imports can be configured to occur automatically once a day, or manually via the API Sync page/link in the left menu. Imports may take a long time on large projects. In one test case an import took 15 minutes for a project with about 10,000 records and 1,500 fields.

sub_settings.name: Record ID Prefix - If data is being imported from multiple projects or entered manually it is highly recommended to specify a record id prefix. This prefix will be prepended to all imported records ids to ensure that they're unique.

compatibility.redcap-version-min-reason: EM Framework commit b184817 is required
